description: Try our easy to follow Coco-Date Breakfast Bars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coco-Date Breakfast Bars Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 20x30cm slice pan with baking paper, extending paper over all sides.
Combine oats, flour, sugar and 1/2 cup shredded coconut in a bowl. Stir in oil. Mix well to combine. Press mixture over base of prepared pan. Bake for 15 minutes. Stand for 20 minutes to cool.

Meanwhile, place dates and 1 cup water in a medium saucepan. Bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Boil, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until water has almost evaporated. Remove from heat. Beat with a wooden spoon until smooth. Cool for 5 minutes.
Spread date mixture over base. Scatter with almonds, coconut flakes and remaining shredded coconut. Bake for 30 minutes. Cool completely in pan. Cut into 16 bars. Serve.
